user_stories.subject: Hey you got some work to do
user_stories.description:
Use this template freely. The only mandatory fields are the subject and the project_slug.
The whole `tasks` field is optional as well.

tasks.subject: Look at me, my definition is optional
Mine too! Plus my assignee defaults to the User Story one!
